DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Efficacy , Safety , Reliability Vardenafil
DOC.criteria: Heterosexual male > /= 18 year old ED six month Subjects also need positive firsttime response single dose 10mg vardenafil eligible randomisation Primary hypoactive sexual desire History myocardial infarction , stroke lifethreatening arrhythmia within prior 6 month Nitrate therapy Other exclusion criterion apply accord Summary Product Characteristics
